para.abstract: The Security Technical Implementation Guides (STIGs) are the configuration standards for U.S. Department of Defense (DoD) Information Assurance (IA) and IA-enabled devices/systems. The guides are maintained and published by the Defense Information Systems Agencyâ€™s (DISA) Field Security Office (FSO).
